children.value: components are used to arrange content and components on the grid within a page.

The math for the website is calculated using a 12 column grid at the large breakpoint, 8 column at medium (tablet) breakpoint and 4 column at the small (mobile) breakpoint. The design is based on a 16 column grid, however the math is calcualted with 12 to prevent having to add a
To learn more about the grid is built, you can read the docs in the
component is a wrapper that adds the
pages as this is already built into the template.
component is a wrapper that adds the
class to a wrapper div. You will want to use this to define rows that you will place
component is used to define column widths for your content, you can set the rules at different breakpoints with the props.
